1.title: Half-Mile Hauler
1.plot: Team installs 200-mph capable suspension on its 1,000-hp '63 Galaxie.

2.title: 6.0 on a Budget
2.plot: Pat and Mike coax 550-hp out of their Working Man's Bullet LS, then test their 816-hp Caprice on a high-speed road course.

3.title: Supercharged Sports Car for Less
3.plot: How to add 100 rwhp to a Scion FR-S with Edelbrock's emissions-legal blower kit.

4.title: Silver Scion FRS
4.plot: The Engine Power guys are impressed with the power gains from the Edelbrock supercharger, so they attack the suspension, clutch and brakes with familiar performance enhancements.

5.title: Atomic Blast Corvette
5.plot: Pat and Mike baseline a 2007 C6 Corvette then add a trick top end package for big power.

7.title: Ford Tribute: Big Inch Windsor Stroker
7.plot: The Engine Power guys pay tribute to Ford's historical 427c.i. FE engine with a big inch, big power producing smallblock.

8.title: Tech School Engine Build Competition
8.plot: Universal Technical Institute (UTI) and Shell help us kick off a student based engine build competition to show off their talent. From the engine stand to the dyno, the competition will be tight.

9.title: Pro Street or No Street Nova - Part I
9.plot: Mike and Pat modernize a mid 90's themed Pro Street '62 Chevy II Nova. Tear down, planning and prep will complete the first portion of this build..

11.title: Pro Street or No Street Nova - Part II
11.plot: This Nova is no joke. It receives its massive power plant, bullet-proof trans and rear-end, plus all the little odds and ends to bring it into the 21st century.

13.title: RISLONE MUSTANG SWEEPSTAKES Ride Part II
13.plot:

14.title: DIFFERENT STROKES for DIFFERENT FOLKS
14.plot:

20.title: NEXT Gen Nova
20.plot:

21.title: ENGINE POWER GNARLY NOVA and UNIVERSAL LS BULLET

24.title: BBQ and BURNOUTS
24.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Junkyard LS Short Block
1.plot: Team builds 4.8 LS on the cheap.

3.title: Old Skool Six
3.plot: Machine shop tech on a Ford straight 6.

4.title: Top End Tricks
4.plot: Building & dyno testing a hopped up Ford 6.

5.title: Driveline Tech
5.plot: Building a custom driveshaft & installing a clutch.

6.title: LS7 Oiling Solution
6.plot: Wet/Dry sump fix for Corvette engine swaps.

8.title: Old School Flatty: Part 1 - How to Hot Rod a Ford Flathead
8.plot: Transforming a junkyard Ford flathead into a classic hot rod V8 with prepping the block to handle a stroked rotating assembly.

9.title: Part 1: Building a 408 Stroker
9.plot: How-to build a modern Chevy stroker starting from scratch with an LQ4 iron truck block strong enough to survive plenty of turbo boost.

10.title: Part 2: Flow Bench Testing Heads
10.plot: The latest GenX cylinder heads are flowed, installed and topped off with multi-port fuel injection before being dyno tuned on pump gas.

11.title: Part 1
11.plot: Transforming an anemic 4 cylinder Mustang with a Ford Racing Coyote Aluminator V8 to become a street legal auto-crosser on steroids.

12.title: Happy Birthday Hemi
12.plot: How-to build an original 426 Hemi to celebrate the 50th anniversary of Chrysler's iconic Elephant big block.

13.title: Part 2
13.plot: How-to turn a stock Fox-body into a competition ready corner carver with suspension, big brakes and cage.

14.title: Old Skool Flatty: 3 Deuce V8
14.plot: Engine guru Keith Dorton helps build our Ford flathead with 3/4 race cam, high compression heads and 3 deuces.

15.title: Heavy Hitter Hemi: Modern 426
15.plot: SAM build team transforms late model Hemi into 426" street fighter with an Edelbrock competition supercharger.

16.title: Barely Legal Mustang Part 3: Cockpit Tech
16.plot: Team sets up their Fox-body Mustang for the track with roll cage, buckets, rear seat delete plus trick fuel and exhaust systems.

17.title: Stealth Crate 427: Heads or Tales?
17.plot: Cylinder head secrets by Pro Stock engine guru Pat Topolinski unlocks the potential of a big block Chevy crate motor.

18.title: Stealth Crate 427: Nitrous Madness
18.plot: Team cams-up their factory Chevy crate 427 and adds a big nitrous shot unlocking 800 HP at the crank.

19.title: : Wicked Turbo Power
19.plot: How to turbo-charge an iron block LS stroker to make 1000 horsepower with a single 88mm turbo and air-to-air intercooler.

20.title: Camaro Combat Prep
20.plot: Drag car body panel kit transforms production COPO into '14 factory model and blown RS G-Machine gets serious brake package.

21.title: Barely Legal Mustang: Facelift
21.plot: Fox-body gets new track-day skin, plus power tuning normally aspirated and supercharged 5.0 Coyotes.

22.title: Lime Dime: 427 Big Block
22.plot: Team creates over-the-top street/strip pickup wedging a nitrous-powered 427 big block into a compact S10.

23.title: Lime Dime: More Power
23.plot: How-to bolt on 300 HP with a wet-nitrous system, install a bed-mounted radiator and index J-wire spark plugs.

52.title: Cadillac LSA 427 Stroker Part 1
52.plot: Cylinder head secrets by Pro Stock engine guru Pat Topolinski unlocks the potential of a big block Chevy crate motor.

1.title: Bowtie on Steroids
1.plot: Team installs latest twin Hellion turbocharger system boosting new Camaro SS to 600 horsepower.

2.title: Sweet Slant Six
2.plot: Team resurrects and hot rods Mopar's indestructible 6 cylinder, the bulletproof 225 Dodge Slant Six.

3.title: Slant Six Duster
3.plot: 71 Dodge gets period-correct restoration with hopped up 225 Slant Six Mopar and fresh automatic trans.

4.title: Blown Monster
4.plot: Engine Power gets the honor of rebuilding the 640 inch blown nitrous injected V8 from the original Bigfoot monster truck.

5.title: Blown Monster CSI
5.plot: The team visits Kaase Racing to machine the 640 inch Ford big block from the first monster truck, Bigfoot #1.

6.title: Six Decades of Power
6.plot: Team celebrates the 60th anniversary of Chevy's small block building a potent supercharged 350 with dual EFI.

7.title: Blunt Force Trauma
7.plot: Mike and Pat assemble and dyno tune massive 640 cubic inch tri-power 429 Ford with 871 blower and nitrous.

8.title: Black & Blue Stage I
8.plot: Team makes big street/strip power by stroking a stock 5.0L small block Ford to 347.

9.title: Black & Blue Stage II
9.plot: Team tests the limits of Ford's 5.0L block with big compression, solid roller cam and 8000 RPM dyno runs.

10.title: Rattle Can Rod: Roller
10.plot: Pat and Mike team up with Duplicolor to build old skool street rod with Factory Five Racing's '33 hot rod kit.

11.title: Rattle Can Rod: Power
11.plot: Mike and Pat install re-engineered drive-train in '33 FFR hot rod kit and test it for Duplicolor sweepstakes.

12.title: Project: Dirt Devil Chevy
12.plot: Pat and Mike reveal secrets on how to build a winning all-iron Chevy small block for dirt track racing.

13.title: Race Track Tuning
13.plot: Team dials in Lime Dime drag truck at the strip with how to set up the trans brake, ladder bar suspension and NOS.

14.title: Project 242: AMC Jeep Six
14.plot: Pat and Mike rebuild and hop up a 4.0L Jeep straight six with trick cam, modified intake and aluminum head.

15.title: Tips & Tricks
15.plot: Engine dyno tuning fact and fiction, performance piston technology and how to build the ultimate engine stand.

16.title: Hellion Mustang
16.plot: New Mustang gets 900 HP twin turbo kit, looser torque converter, one piece driveshaft and heavy duty driveline upgrades.

17.title: Supercar Slayer: PowerStop Z06
17.plot: C6 Z06 gets new Track Day brake package, suspension upgrades, sticky tires plus get more LS7 power with long-tube headers.

18.title: PowerStop Z06: Supercharged
18.plot: Supercharging a 2008 Z06 and adding Z26 performance brake package to out perform the new $90,000 Z06 Corvette.

19.title: Bracket Blaster 572
19.plot: Pat and Mike freshen a 572 with a radical cam swap and test a hi-rise intake verses a dual-quad tunnel ram.

20.title: Black & Blue: Stage III
20.plot: Team takes their wild 347 Ford to Stage 3 with Hellion 76mm turbocharger, making massive power on race gas.

21.title: 460 to the Max
21.plot: We stretch a Ford big block to 557 cubes and flog our Power Stop Z06 at the new Corvette racetrack.

22.title: Nitrous Big Block Ford
22.plot: Pat and Mike button up their 557" Ford stroker and add a healthy dose of nitrous on the dyno.

23.title: Galaxie Teardown
23.plot: Team preps survivor '63 Galaxie for 1/2 mile top-speed assault, installing our turbo'd Black and Blue 347.

1.title: In House Power Mouse: Stage I
1.plot: The first of a 3 stage build of the durable small block Chevy. A back to basics 355 inch powerplant that makes great reliable power for under 4000 bucks.

2.title: In House Power Mouse: Stage II
2.plot: Stage II of our small block Chevy build get's block modifications and a competition rotating assembly to complete a solid shortblock.

3.title: In House Power Mouse: Stage II Part II
3.plot: Completing the small block Chevy with trick induction from the heads to the intake manifold. This potent combo makes big power on the dyno.

4.title: NMRA World Finals
4.plot: We're taking you to the NMRA (National Mustang Racers Association) Finals in Bowling Green, where championships are on the line and the action is non-stop.

5.title: Cadillac LSA 427 Stroker Part 1
5.plot: Pat and Mike look for big power from the factory supercharged power house found in the Cadillac CTS-V's.

7.title: Ford's 390FE Engine Gets Attention
7.plot: The Engine Power team builds a budget friendly Ford 390FE with a modern twist.

8.title: Mid-Engine Madness: Building a Factory Five 818C
8.plot: Pat and Mike team up with Factory Five to build the most inexpensive mid-engine supercar ever. Powered by a Mustang Ecoboost 4, it'll outrun a new Corvette.

9.title: 512 - Cube Big-Block Mopar
9.plot: The Engine Power team builds a really big RB Mopar. Short-block is covered in part 1 and features the best parts in the business.

10.title: Mopar Magic
10.plot: Team tops its 512 Mopar stroker with Trick Flow's slick new big-block heads and intake, then hits the dyno.

11.title: Grey Hair, White Knuckle Caprice
11.plot: Pat and Mike take grandma's '93 Caprice and upgrade the rear and suspension for an 816-hourse supercharged LSA swap.

12.title: Yeah, It's a Hemi
12.plot: The guys build a twin-turbo-capable 420-inch Gen III Hemi for install in a Hellcat-pounding SRT8 Challenger.

13.title: Hemi Top End Magic
13.plot: Pat and Mike button up their Gen III Hemi with super trick heads, then it's tech tip time with Mike and Pat.

14.title: In-House Power Mouse Roars
14.plot: In Stage 3 of our small-block build, our 383 becomes a 406 and gets a centrifugal supercharger to make mega-power.

15.title: Grey Hair, White Knuckle Part II
15.plot: Team buttons up our 800-plus horse LSA-powered '93 Caprice.

16.title: Galaxie Time Capsule
16.plot: A '63 Galaxie is rolled into the shop and fitted with the 347 turbo known as "Little Black and Blue."

17.title: Big, Bad Buick
17.plot: The guys team up with Stage 1 Automotive to build a 462-inch Buick that makes surprising pump-gas power.

18.title: Twin Turbo GT350R Install
18.plot: Pat and Mike put twin turbos on the ultimate factory Mustang, the Shelby GT350R.

19.title: Battlestar Galaxie
19.plot: Team continues the transformation of its turbocharged '63 Galaxie into a top-speed terror. Also, converting a cranky carbureted small-block to fuel-injection.

20.title: COPO A Go-Go
20.plot: Pat and Mike team up with SAM Tech to show you the secrets of building a high-horsepower COPO Camaro engine.

21.title: Making a Mustang Monster
21.plot: Mike and Pat do the first install of the hottest new ProCharger blower on a Mustang GT, then strap it to the dyno where it puts down wild numbers on pump gas.

22.title: Caprice Capstone
22.plot: The guys wrap up the 816-hp "Grey Hair White Knuckle" Caprice, getting it track ready. Plus, learn how to get a motorsports degree from a high performance college.

23.title: Rat Trap
23.plot: Mike and Pat build a high - compression race rat with lots of cubes.

-1.title: Stage I
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.title: PowerNation: Engine Power
plot: Pro engine builders and hosts Pat Topolinski and Mike Galley give viewers the secrets on assembling and tuning everything from mild performance street machines to full race monsters.
